001package imagingbook.pub.geometry.moments;
002
003import java.util.Collection;
004
005import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
006
007/**
008 * This class defines static methods for moment calculations on 2D point sets.
009 * TODO: make more efficient versions!
010 * 
011 * @author WB
012 *
013 */
014public abstract class Moments2D {
015
016        public static double ordinaryMoment(Collection<? extends Pnt2d> points, int p, int q) {
017                double Mpq = 0.0;
018                for (Pnt2d pnt : points) {
019                        Mpq += Math.pow(pnt.getX(), p) * Math.pow(pnt.getY(), q);
020                }
021                return Mpq;
022        }
023
024        public static double centralMoment(Collection<? extends Pnt2d> points, int p, int q) {
025                double m00 = ordinaryMoment(points, 0, 0); // region area
026                double xCtr = ordinaryMoment(points, 1, 0) / m00;
027                double yCtr = ordinaryMoment(points, 0, 1) / m00;
028                double cMpq = 0.0;
029                for (Pnt2d pnt : points) {
030                        cMpq += Math.pow(pnt.getX() - xCtr, p) * Math.pow(pnt.getY() - yCtr, q);
031                }
032                return cMpq;
033        }
034        
035        public static double normalizedCentralMoment(Collection<? extends Pnt2d> points, int p, int q) {
036                double m00 = ordinaryMoment(points, 0, 0);
037                double scale = Math.pow(m00, 0.5 * (p + q + 2));
038                return centralMoment(points, p, q) / scale;
039        }
040
041}
